name: QuasiconvexOn.dual
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝³ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝² : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝¹ : LE β
inst✝ : SMul 𝕜 E

a✝ : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f
⊢ QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s (Function.comp (⇑OrderDual.toDual) f)
decl:
theorem QuasiconvexOn.dual : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f → QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s (toDual ∘ f) :=
  id

name: Convex.quasiconvexOn_of_convex_le
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝³ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝² : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝¹ : LE β
inst✝ : SMul 𝕜 E
s : Set E
f : E → β
hs : Convex 𝕜 s
h : ∀ (r : β), Convex 𝕜 (setOf fun x => LE.le (f x) r)
⊢ QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f
decl:
theorem Convex.quasiconvexOn_of_convex_le (hs : Convex 𝕜 s) (h : ∀ r, Convex 𝕜 { x | f x ≤ r }) :
    QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f := fun r => hs.inter (h r)

⊢ QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s f

name: QuasiconvexOn.convex
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝³ : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝² : LE β
inst✝¹ : SMul 𝕜 E
s : Set E
f : E → β
inst✝ : IsDirected β fun x1 x2 => LE.le x1 x2
hf : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f
⊢ Convex 𝕜 s
decl:
theorem QuasiconvexOn.convex [IsDirected β (· ≤ ·)] (hf : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f) : Convex 𝕜 s :=
  fun x hx y hy _ _ ha hb hab =>
  let ⟨_, hxz, hyz⟩ := exists_ge_ge (f x) (f y)
  (hf _ ⟨hx, hxz⟩ ⟨hy, hyz⟩ ha hb hab).1

name: QuasiconcaveOn.convex
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜

inst✝² : LE β
inst✝¹ : SMul 𝕜 E
s : Set E
f : E → β
inst✝ : IsDirected β fun x1 x2 => GE.ge x1 x2
hf : QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s f
⊢ Convex 𝕜 s
decl:
theorem QuasiconcaveOn.convex [IsDirected β (· ≥ ·)] (hf : QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s f) : Convex 𝕜 s :=
  hf.dual.convex

name: QuasiconvexOn.sup
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝³ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝² : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝¹ : SMul 𝕜 E
s : Set E
f g : E → β
inst✝ : SemilatticeSup β
hf : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f
hg : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s g
⊢ QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s (Max.max f g)
decl:
theorem QuasiconvexOn.sup [SemilatticeSup β] (hf : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f)
    (hg : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s g) : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s (f ⊔ g) := by
  intro r
  simp_rw [Pi.sup_def, sup_le_iff, Set.sep_and]
  exact (hf r).inter (hg r)

⊢ QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s (Min.min f g)
decl:
theorem QuasiconcaveOn.inf [SemilatticeInf β] (hf : QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s f)
    (hg : QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s g) : QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s (f ⊓ g) :=
  hf.dual.sup hg

name: quasiconvexOn_iff_le_max
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝³ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝² : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝¹ : LinearOrder β
inst✝ : SMul 𝕜 E
s : Set E
f : E → β
⊢ Iff (QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f) (And (Convex 𝕜 s) (∀ ⦃x : E⦄, Membership.mem s x → ∀ ⦃y : E⦄, Membership.mem s y → ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, LE.le 0 a → LE.le 0 b → Eq (HAdd.hAdd a b) 1 → LE.le (f (HAdd.hAdd (HSMul.hSMul a x) (HSMul.hSMul b y))) (Max.max (f x) (f y))))
decl:
theorem quasiconvexOn_iff_le_max : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f ↔ Convex 𝕜 s ∧ ∀ ⦃x⦄, x ∈ s → ∀ ⦃y⦄,
    y ∈ s → ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, 0 ≤ a → 0 ≤ b → a + b = 1 → f (a • x + b • y) ≤ max (f x) (f y) :=
  ⟨fun hf =>
    ⟨hf.convex, fun _ hx _ hy _ _ ha hb hab =>
      (hf _ ⟨hx, le_max_left _ _⟩ ⟨hy, le_max_right _ _⟩ ha hb hab).2⟩,
    fun hf _ _ hx _ hy _ _ ha hb hab =>
    ⟨hf.1 hx.1 hy.1 ha hb hab, (hf.2 hx.1 hy.1 ha hb hab).trans <| max_le hx.2 hy.2⟩⟩

name: quasiconcaveOn_iff_min_le
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝³ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝² : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝¹ : LinearOrder β
inst✝ : SMul 𝕜 E
s : Set E
f : E → β
⊢ Iff (QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s f) (And (Convex 𝕜 s) (∀ ⦃x : E⦄, Membership.mem s x → ∀ ⦃y : E⦄, Membership.mem s y → ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, LE.le 0 a → LE.le 0 b → Eq (HAdd.hAdd a b) 1 → LE.le (Min.min (f x) (f y)) (f (HAdd.hAdd (HSMul.hSMul a x) (HSMul.hSMul b y)))))

name: quasilinearOn_iff_mem_uIcc
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝³ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝² : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝¹ : LinearOrder β
inst✝ : SMul 𝕜 E
s : Set E
f : E → β
⊢ Iff (QuasilinearOn 𝕜 s f) (And (Convex 𝕜 s) (∀ ⦃x : E⦄, Membership.mem s x → ∀ ⦃y : E⦄, Membership.mem s y → ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, LE.le 0 a → LE.le 0 b → Eq (HAdd.hAdd a b) 1 → Membership.mem (Set.uIcc (f x) (f y)) (f (HAdd.hAdd (HSMul.hSMul a x) (HSMul.hSMul b y)))))
decl:
theorem quasilinearOn_iff_mem_uIcc : QuasilinearOn 𝕜 s f ↔ Convex 𝕜 s ∧ ∀ ⦃x⦄, x ∈ s → ∀ ⦃y⦄,
    y ∈ s → ∀ ⦃a b : 𝕜⦄, 0 ≤ a → 0 ≤ b → a + b = 1 → f (a • x + b • y) ∈ uIcc (f x) (f y) := by
  rw [QuasilinearOn, quasiconvexOn_iff_le_max, quasiconcaveOn_iff_min_le, and_and_and_comm,
    and_self_iff]
  apply and_congr_right'
  simp_rw [← forall_and, ← Icc_min_max, mem_Icc, and_comm]

name: QuasiconvexOn.convex_lt
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
β : Type u_3
inst✝³ : OrderedSemiring 𝕜
inst✝² : AddCommMonoid E
inst✝¹ : LinearOrder β
inst✝ : SMul 𝕜 E
s : Set E
f : E → β
hf : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f
r : β
⊢ Convex 𝕜 (setOf fun x => And (Membership.mem s x) (LT.lt (f x) r))
decl:
theorem QuasiconvexOn.convex_lt (hf : QuasiconvexOn 𝕜 s f) (r : β) :
    Convex 𝕜 ({ x ∈ s | f x < r }) := by
  refine fun x hx y hy a b ha hb hab => ?_
  have h := hf _ ⟨hx.1, le_max_left _ _⟩ ⟨hy.1, le_max_right _ _⟩ ha hb hab
  exact ⟨h.1, h.2.trans_lt <| max_lt hx.2 hy.2⟩

name: QuasiconcaveOn.convex_gt
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
β : Type u_3

inst✝ : SMul 𝕜 E
s : Set E
f : E → β
hf : QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s f
r : β
⊢ Convex 𝕜 (setOf fun x => And (Membership.mem s x) (LT.lt r (f x)))
decl:
theorem QuasiconcaveOn.convex_gt (hf : QuasiconcaveOn 𝕜 s f) (r : β) :
    Convex 𝕜 ({ x ∈ s | r < f x }) :=
  hf.dual.convex_lt r

name: QuasilinearOn.monotoneOn_or_antitoneOn
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
β : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedField 𝕜
s : Set 𝕜
f : 𝕜 → β
inst✝ : LinearOrder β
hf : QuasilinearOn 𝕜 s f
⊢ Or (MonotoneOn f s) (AntitoneOn f s)
decl:
theorem QuasilinearOn.monotoneOn_or_antitoneOn [LinearOrder β] (hf : QuasilinearOn 𝕜 s f) :
    MonotoneOn f s ∨ AntitoneOn f s := by
  simp_rw [monotoneOn_or_antitoneOn_iff_uIcc, ← segment_eq_uIcc]
  rintro a ha b hb c _ h
  refine ⟨((hf.2 _).segment_subset ?_ ?_ h).2, ((hf.1 _).segment_subset ?_ ?_ h).2⟩ <;> simp [*]

name: quasilinearOn_iff_monotoneOn_or_antitoneOn
initialProofState:
𝕜 : Type u_1
β : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedField 𝕜
s : Set 𝕜
f : 𝕜 → β
inst✝ : LinearOrderedAddCommMonoid β
hs : Convex 𝕜 s
⊢ Iff (QuasilinearOn 𝕜 s f) (Or (MonotoneOn f s) (AntitoneOn f s))
decl:
theorem quasilinearOn_iff_monotoneOn_or_antitoneOn [LinearOrderedAddCommMonoid β]
    (hs : Convex 𝕜 s) : QuasilinearOn 𝕜 s f ↔ MonotoneOn f s ∨ AntitoneOn f s :=
  ⟨fun h => h.monotoneOn_or_antitoneOn, fun h =>
    h.elim (fun h => h.quasilinearOn hs) fun h => h.quasilinearOn hs⟩
